sentences.en: In an air raid last night the enemy aircraft bombed the city.
sentences.cn: 在昨晚的空袭中敌机轰炸了该城.

sentences.en: It sounds like an air raid siren.
sentences.cn: 那听起来像是空袭警报。

sentences.en: On 2 April 1916 air - raid warnings sounded throughout Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 1916年4月2日空袭警报响彻了整个爱丁堡.

sentences.en: Our house was blown up in an air raid.
sentences.cn: 在一次空袭中我们的房子被炸掉了.

sentences.en: People were making for the air-raid shelters below ground.
sentences.cn: 人们正奔向地下防空洞。

sentences.en: She made her way to the kitchen to raid the fridge.
sentences.cn: 她走向厨房去扫荡冰箱。

sentences.en: The army should have operated in conjunction with the fleet to raid the enemy's coast.
sentences.cn: 陆军本应与舰队共同行动，突袭敌方海岸。

sentences.en: The family was killed in an air raid.
sentences.cn: 这家人在一次空袭中遇难。

sentences.en: The hostages were freed in the commando raid.
sentences.cn: 在突击队的突袭行动中，人质获释。

sentences.en: The president was absolutely right in ordering the bombing raid.
sentences.cn: 总统下令发动空袭是绝对合乎道义的。

sentences.en: The raid was a brilliant success.
The raid was an unjustifiable act of aggression.
sentences.cn: 那次偷袭是一种不正当的侵略行径。

sentences.en: The rebels attempted a surprise raid on a military camp.
sentences.cn: 叛军试图突袭一处军营。

sentences.en: The village was obliterated in the bombing raid.
sentences.cn: 这个村庄在轰炸袭击中被完全毁灭了.

sentences.en: There was a raid on a bank by armed mobs yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天发生了一起武装暴徒抢劫银行的事件.
